articles.author: Laura J. Nelson, Maya Lau
articles.title: The wealthy scramble to get the COVID-19 vaccine - The San Diego Union-Tribune
articles.description: Concierge doctor's offices are stocking up with ultra-low temperature freezers and are being inundated with calls from well-heeled clients
articles.content: Theyre offering tens of thousands of dollars in cash, making their personal assistants pester doctors every day, and asking whether a five-figure donation to a hospital would help them jump the line.… [+7910 chars]

articles.author: Jen Rose Smith, CNN
articles.title: Pandemic demand for mental health care is overwhelming providers - CNN
articles.description: At a time when the ongoing pandemic is straining mental health, many people are going without care altogether. Experts say the pandemic is worsening a shortage of mental health care providers that far predates the current crisis.
